column5: Elegant and classically updated 2 bedroom, 2. 5 bathroom condo is situated in a upscale, gated golf course community over looking one of the top rated Golf Schools in the US. Fully appointed and ready to entertain families, couples, mens golf groups or girl getaways. Your host lives in the neighborhood & available to cater to any need that might arise or answer any question you might have about the area.
